front.title: Echo Request/Reply for Enabled In-situ OAM Capabilities

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the echo request/reply mechanisms used in IPv6, MPLS and SFC environments, which can be used within an IOAM domain, allowing the IOAM encapsulating node to acquire the enabled IOAM capabilities of each IOAM transit node and/ or IOAM decapsulating node.
